title: The Markets, Ukraine, And Biden’s SCOTUS Pick
itunes:title: The Markets, Ukraine, And Biden’s SCOTUS Pick
description:
David Kudla, founder, CEO, and Chief Investment Strategist with Mainstay Capital Management, talks about the market reaction to the Ukraine war and how it shifts the economic outlook in 2022. Lauren Hein, Head of Advisor Relations at ROBO Global, talks about tech equities reacting to the Ukraine war. Tom Orlik, Chief Economist with Bloomberg Economics, discusses the Bloomberg “Big Take” story on the global economic implications of the war in Ukraine. June Grasso, host of “Bloomberg Law” and “Bloomberg Opinion,” discusses President Biden’s Supreme Court pick. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
